attributes.additional_details:
Dear Cabinet,
Parliament of United Kingdom

I am writing to you, because I believe on Britain stand on Humanity.

It is severely depressing to know what’s happening in Syria - All the bombardment of deadly weapons, bombs in civilian areas is heart breaking.

I understand how much pain is in loosing a person. We know the pain of loosing relative or a friend or a known person, so I can imagine how much pain a civil society in Syria is undergoing!

I am writing this petition as a concerned human being.

I request leading country like Britain to involve and initiate the talk with the world leaders to safeguard the innocent lives in Syria.

Sincerely
